author: xinbenlv
content: Love to get your advice on EIP-5081 for expiring transactions~

author: lightclient
content: have u implemented in geth? please share pr if/when you do and i will take a look

author: lightclient
content: I’m afraid that expiring transactions are not a high priority for core devs. They have some use cases, yes, but there are many other desired features (for accounts and otherwise) that have priority right now. I think the most helpful thing to try and persuade people that expiring transactions should be done is to prove that either i) it’s simple to implement and safe or ii) provides a very important functionality. Both would be ideal
